source:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_SEQ_00Maru is keeping his distance from a nearby crate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラス・ジョブでのみ進行します。

スワルナの大蔵のマルルゥは、危険な仕事を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_00<tab>Use the Daemir Demolishers on the mudstone mound in the Shroud of the Samgha.
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_00<tab>衆園の森の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB6DF01 /var>に、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91CF01 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone to Maru.

TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_000<tab>I've been meanin' to ask you this for some time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but truth be told, I was nervous. Thought it might be too dangerous...
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>、相談させて……。
頼みたいことがあるんだけど、ちょっと危ない仕事なんだよね。

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_001<tab>But then Kancana told me that your adventures've tossed you into the maw of death an' back again. I figure handlin' some explosives is child's play compared to that...right?
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_001冒険者として、いろいろな仕事をこなしてきたって、
カーンチャナから聞いてるけど……
もしかして、爆発物の取り扱いもできたりしない？

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_002<tab>...Well, you're still here, so I'll take that as a sign of tacit agreement. We need someone to break up the mudstone around Ksiroda an' bring back a piece. The alchemists keep tellin' me this is the best way, but...just mind your fingers, alright?
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_002を渡すから、「」を爆破して、
「」を持ってきてほしいんだ。
取り扱いには、十分気をつけてね……。

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_010<tab>There you are─an' with fingers an' toes still attached! I take it that means the alchemists were right after all.
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_010どうだった？
「」は手に入った……？

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_011<tab>Good, good─these'll do it. Mixin' mudstone into water makes a paste that keeps the skin safer from sun an' wind than just about anythin'.
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_011バッチリだよ、ありがとー。
この泥岩を砕いて水に溶くと、きめ細やかな泥になるんだけど、
それが、天然の日焼け止めとして役立つんだ……。

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_012<tab>You might not think it to look at 'em, but hippos have a delicate hide. If you don't keep it nice and moist, it'll crack like so much mud on a hot day. We're really in your debt this time.
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_012ヒッポの肌って意外とデリケートだから、
保湿してあげないと、すぐに荒れちゃうんだよね。
それで、この仕事を依頼させてもらったわけ……。

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_013<tab>Sure, maybe you could've just broken up the stone with a hammer an' chisel...but now I don't gotta worry about someone accidentally settin' those demolishers alight an' blowin' us all into the next life, neither.
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_013さっそく仲間と、日焼け止め作りを始めるとするよ。
これはお礼、受け取ってー。
